mapper.select: select count(case when sale_month = '01' then 1 end) as "Jan", count(case when sale_month = '02' then 1 end) as "Feb", count(case when sale_month = '03' then 1 end) as "Mar", count(case when sale_month = '04' then 1 end) as "Apr", count(case when sale_month = '05' then 1 end) as "May", count(case when sale_month = '06' then 1 end) as "Jun", count(case when sale_month = '07' then 1 end) as "Jul", count(case when sale_month = '08' then 1 end) as "Aug", count(case when sale_month = '09' then 1 end) as "Sep", count(case when sale_month = '10' then 1 end) as "Oct", count(case when sale_month = '11' then 1 end) as "Nov", count(case when sale_month = '12' then 1 end) as "Dec" from (select substr(modified_date,6,2) as sale_month from item where sale_status = #{salestatus}) T

select mc.name as maincategoryname, count(mc.name)/3 as num from item i inner join category_sub sc on i.category_sub_id = sc.category_main_id inner join category_main mc on sc.category_main_id = mc.category_main_id group by mc.name

select mc.name as mainCategoryName, sc.name as subcategoryname, count(sc.name) as num from item i left join category_sub sc on i.category_sub_id = sc.category_main_id left join category_main mc on sc.category_main_id = mc.category_main_id where 1=1 group by sc.name

select m.category_main_id as mainId, m.name as mainName, s.category_sub_id as subId, s.name as subName, (select count(category_sub_id) from item where category_sub_id=s.category_sub_id) as num from category_main m left join category_sub s on m.category_main_id = s.category_main_id
